data.title: NIST 800-53: Access Control
data.phrase:
datamodel
| filter xdm.event.type contains "Access"
| filter xdm.source.user_agent contains "Mac" OR xdm.source.host.os_family contains "MAC"
| fields _time, xdm.event.type, xdm.source.user_agent, xdm.target.sent_bytes, xdm.observer.product

data.title: NIST 800-53: Audit and Accountability
data.phrase:
datamodel 
| filter xdm.event.operation contains "REGISTRY" /*Filter for reg set events*/
| fields _time, xdm.event.type, xdm.event.operation, xdm.event.operation_sub_type, xdm.source.host.hostname, xdm.source.user.username, xdm.source.agent.identifier, xdm.source.process.name, xdm.source.process.executable.path, xdm.event.outcome, xdm.observer.product

data.title: NIST 800-53: Assessment, Authorization, and Monitoring
data.phrase:
datamodel 
| filter xdm.auth.kerberos_tgt.encryption_type contains "*"
| fields xdm.auth.kerberos_tgt.encryption_type , xdm.source.host.hostname, xdm.source.ipv4, xdm.source.user.username, xdm.source.port, xdm.target.host.hostname, xdm.target.ipv4, xdm.target.user.username 
| limit 500

data.title: NIST 800-53: Configuration Management
data.phrase: datamodel | filter xdm.observer.content_version contains "*" | fields xdm.source.host.hostname, xdm.source.agent.identifier, xdm.observer.content_version

data.title: NIST 800-53: Identification and Authentication
data.phrase:
datamodel | filter xdm.event.operation = "IMAGE_LOAD" //Image Load event
| filter xdm.source.host.hostname contains "*"
| fields xdm.source.host.hostname, xdm.source.user.username, xdm.event.operation, xdm.event.operation_sub_type, xdm.source.agent.identifier, xdm.source.process.name, xdm.source.process.executable.path, xdm.observer.product

data.title: NIST 800-53: Incident Response
data.phrase:
datamodel
| filter xdm.network.rule contains "*"
| fields xdm.network.rule, xdm.network.application_protocol, xdm.network.application_protocol_category, xdm.network.http.method, xdm.network.http.response_code, xdm.network.http.url_category, xdm.network.ip_protocol, xdm.network.protocol_layers, xdm.network.session_id

data.title: NIST 800-53: Maintenance
data.phrase:
datamodel | filter xdm.observer.product = "XDR agent"
| filter xdm.observer.content_version contains "*"
| dedup xdm.observer.name
| fields xdm.observer.product , xdm.observer.name, xdm.observer.content_version, xdm.observer.type, xdm.observer.unique_identifier, xdm.observer.vendor, xdm.observer.version, _time

data.title: NIST 800-53: Physical and Environmental Protection
data.phrase: datamodel | fields xdm.source.user.first_name, xdm.source.user.last_name, xdm.source.user.middle_name, xdm.source.user.employee_id, xdm.source.user.badge_id

data.title: NIST 800-53: Planning
data.phrase: datamodel | filter xdm.observer.product contains "Cortex" | fields xdm.observer.*

data.title: NIST 800-53: Personnel Security
data.phrase:
datamodel 
| fields xdm.source.user.first_name, xdm.source.user.last_name, xdm.source.user.middle_name, xdm.source.user.employee_id, xdm.source.user.badge_id 
| filter xdm.source.user.badge_id contains "*"

data.title: NIST: PII Proccesing and Transparency
data.phrase: datamodel | filter xdm.auth.kerberos_tgt.encryption_type contains "AES" | fields xdm.auth.kerberos_tgt.encryption_type , xdm.source.host.hostname, xdm.source.ipv4, xdm.source.user.username, xdm.source.port, xdm.target.host.hostname, xdm.target.ipv4, xdm.target.user.username | limit 500

data.title: NIST 800-53: Risk Assessment
data.phrase:
datamodel 
| filter xdm.observer.content_version contains "*" 
| filter XDM.source.host.os contains "*"
| fields xdm.source.host.hostname, xdm.source.host.ipv4_addresses, xdm.source.host.mac_addresses, xdm.source.host.os, xdm.source.host.os_family

data.title: NIST 800-53: System and Services Acquisition
data.phrase: datamodel | filter xdm.observer.vendor contains "PANW" | fields xdm.observer.* | limit 500

data.title: NIST 800-53: System and Communications Protection
data.phrase: datamodel | filter xdm.auth.kerberos_tgt.encryption_type contains "AES" | fields xdm.auth.kerberos_tgt.encryption_type , xdm.source.host.hostname, xdm.source.ipv4, xdm.source.user.username, xdm.source.port, xdm.target.host.hostname, xdm.target.ipv4, xdm.target.user.username | limit 500

data.title: NIST 800-53: System and Information Integrity
data.phrase: datamodel | filter xdm.source.agent.version contains "*" | fields xdm.source.host.hostname, xdm.source.agent.identifier, xdm.observer.content_version

data.title: NIST 800-53: Supply Chain Risk Management
data.phrase:
datamodel 
| filter xdm.observer.content_version contains "*" 
| filter xdm.source.agent.version contains "*"
| fields xdm.source.host.hostname, xdm.source.agent.version, xdm.source.host.ipv4_addresses, xdm.source.host.mac_addresses, xdm.source.host.os, xdm.source.agent.content_version, xdm.source.agent.identifier
